title: Underwater Welding: Techniques, Challenges, and Materials

comments.text: Interesting article on underwater welding – directly relevant to building and maintaining undersea habitats.  The challenges highlighted, especially with wet welding and corrosion, are critical considerations for any long-term subsea structure, including those near hydrothermal vents or underwater volcanoes.
